ca.concordia.app.service

Class GamePlayService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.app.service.GamePlayService

  • public class GamePlayService
extends java.lang.Object
    This is GamePlayService class through which game is going to play. It also contains startup, reinforcement and fortification phases.
    Author:
    Parth Nayak

      • doStartupPhase

        public boolean doStartupPhase(int numberOfPlayers)
        This is startup phase. As per the number of players it will generate the data, initializing players data, allocating countries to players and it will add aremies using round-robin fashion.
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers - the number of players
        Returns:
        true, if successful
